Dialogue: Ahh, Good morn. What brings you to my humble shop
Answer0: Do you have any work for me?

Dialogue: I do have a small task
I do have a small task
You see I lost my ship, The Nebuchadnezzar
Answer0: I thought this was going to be a small problem

Dialogue: Oh but it is, yesterday I made just a short journey to Albien. But my crew has  gone missing along with ole' Nebby. I need you to find Nebby and you'll get a bonus if you can find my first mate, uhh John I think his name was.
Answer0: Bonus, we haven't even negotiated the princial yet.

Dialogue: Looking to negotiate are you? I'll pay you 100 talons for the ship and 20 for the 1st mate.
Answer0: Surely a captain with such fine repute can afford a little more
Answer1: It's awfully Dangerous inquireing around these parts, make it 150, and 30 for the mate.

Dialogue: Of course of course, anything for Nebby. Make it 150. Now go Quickly!
Dangerous? I don't need a coward's help. You'll do it for 50. That or get out of my sight.
Thank you, thank you I'll pay you 150 talons for the safe return of Nebby and an additional 20 talons if you find my first mate

Answer0: We found your ship just one town over.
Answer1: Actually we were hoping you had some piece of information that could help us.

Dialogue: And my first mate John? He has a lot of explaining to do.
Answer0: Actually his name is Jim, and he's here with quite a story to tell.
Answer1: We never were able to find him

Dialogue: Hey captain, I didn't mean to worry you. But thanks to Black Mage it was all worth it.
You can tell me all about it over dinner. I'm just glad to have Nebby back… and my crew as well.

Back to business though. Black Mage, I'm very grateful for your help. Here is the agreed upon sum, plus the bonus for finding John. Also please take just one more thing, this potion comes from Jermady and is the strongest I've come across in my travels.
Answer0: Thank you Captain, I'm glad things turned out in the end. We'll see you around.

Dialogue: You can tell me all about it over dinner. I'm just glad to have Nebby back… and my crew as well.
